string.company_introduce: ZEEWIND is a company dedicated to the develop and production of unmanned aerial vehicle detection and countermeasure equipment, aka CUAS devices. ZEEWIND not only provide professional airspace security solutions, in addition, we also offer industry-specific consulting services to help clients understand and meet their professional needs.
string.company_name_full: 深圳市智影达科技有限公司

products.rce1u_describe: The RCE-1U is an all-in-one unmanned aerial vehicle (UAV) countermeasure device designed for detection and counteraction. The device disrupts and counters UAVs by emitting specific frequency electromagnetic waves, thereby blocking the communication or navigation links of the UAV and achieving rapid target diversion or forced landing. This product provides real-time display of counteraction modes, battery levels, and other information. It can be used independently or combined with UAV detection products to form a "Detect'n Strike" system.

mention.rce1u: We have fully test on DJI [Avatar, FPV, Mavic, Mavic Air, Mavic Mini, Mavic Phantom, Mavic Spark] and Parrot [ANAFI, Bebop, Bebop 2 Power]. Theoretically, this type of radio jamming device can effect to most of the devices including but not limited to [UAV, ground drones, mobile phones, remote controller (ground station), etc...].
mention.interesting: We also have a cyberattack device under development, witch can hackin those type of drone and gain control permission. Check our [article](link) for more details.
